content.enable_wireguard_desc: Connection will be established when network time synchronization is available.
content.default_if_desc: While WireGuard connection is established, all non-local traffic is sent over the VPN.
content.internal_ip_invalid: The IP address must have four groups between 0 and 255 separated with a dot. For example 10.0.0.2
content.internal_subnet: Subnet mask of the WireGuard network
content.internal_subnet_invalid: The subnet mask IP must have four groups between 0 and 255 separated with a dot. For example 255.255.255.0
content.internal_gateway_invalid: The gateway IP must have four groups between 0 and 255 separated with a dot. For example 10.0.0.1
content.allowed_ip: Allowed source IP of received packets
content.allowed_ip_invalid: The IP address must have four groups between 0 and 255 separated with a dot. For example 10.0.0.2
content.allowed_subnet: Allowed subnet mask of received packets
content.allowed_subnet_invalid: The subnet mask IP must have four groups between 0 and 255 separated with a dot. For example 255.255.255.0
